53  |  WorkforceArcBest Named to the 2021 Top 500 
List of Best Employers for Diversity
ArcBest was named to Forbes’ 2021 Top 500 List of Best 
Employers for Diversity for the third consecutive year. 
At ArcBest, we have a strong values-driven culture, and we’re 
focused on attracting and retaining talented employees who 
live out our values and provide a best-in-class customer 
experience. We are also committed to providing a work 
environment that embraces differing backgrounds and makes 
everyone feel valued. It is very gratifying to be among the 
Best Employers for Diversity for a third consecutive year. 
Judy R. McReynolds
ArcBest chairman, president and CEO
